title: support SharpDX, or provide your own access to DX/D2D, ... in CSharp
body: The fact that we have to go through C++ to exploit such key resources as DX, D2D, DrawingSurfaces in W8, WPF, WP8 is _NOT_ acceptable.

comments.body: I can't speak for the original poster, but managed access to the API should be available via a convenient, Microsoft-provided, built-in API.
What is the downside you see that you don't want to use SharpDX?
